name: AlwaysAnimate
description: Animates anything that can be animated, besides status emojis.

name: AlwaysTrust
description: Removes the annoying untrusted domain and suspicious file popup

name: AnonymiseFileNames
description: Anonymise uploaded file names

name: WebRichPresence (arRPC)
description: Client plugin for arRPC to enable RPC on Discord Web (experimental)

name: BANger
description: Replaces the GIF in the ban dialogue with a custom one.

name: BetterFolders
description: Shows server folders on dedicated sidebar and adds folder related improvements

name: BetterGifAltText
description: Change GIF alt text from simply being 'GIF' to containing the gif tags / filename

name: BetterNotesBox
description: Hide notes or disable spellcheck (Configure in settings!!)

name: BetterRoleDot
description: Copy role colour on RoleDot (accessibility setting) click. Also allows using both RoleDot and coloured names simultaneously

name: BetterUploadButton
description: Upload with a single click, open menu with right click

name: BiggerStreamPreview
description: This plugin allows you to enlarge stream previews

name: BlurNSFW
description: Blur attachments in NSFW channels until hovered

name: CallTimer
description: Adds a timer to vcs

name: ClearURLs
description: Removes tracking garbage from URLs

name: ColorSighted
description: Removes the colorblind-friendly icons from statuses, just like 2015-2017 Discord

name: ConsoleShortcuts
description: Adds shorter Aliases for many things on the window. Run `shortcutList` for a list.

name: CrashHandler
description: Utility plugin for handling and possibly recovering from Crashes without a restart

name: CustomRPC
description: Allows you to set a custom rich presence.

name: DevCompanion
description: Dev Companion Plugin

name: DisableDMCallIdle
description: Disables automatically getting kicked from a DM voice call after 3 minutes.

name: EmoteCloner
description: Allows you to clone Emotes & Stickers to your own server (right click them)

name: Experiments
description: Enable Access to Experiments in Discord!

name: F8Break
description: Pause the client when you press F8 with DevTools (+ breakpoints) open.

name: FakeNitro
description: Allows you to stream in nitro quality, send fake emojis/stickers and use client themes.

name: FakeProfileThemes
description: Allows profile theming by hiding the colors in your bio thanks to invisible 3y3 encoding

name: FavoriteEmojiFirst
description: Puts your favorite emoji first in the emoji autocomplete.

name: FavoriteGifSearch
description: Adds a search bar for favorite gifs

name: FixInbox
description: Fixes the Unreads Inbox from crashing Discord when you're in lots of guilds.

name: ForceOwnerCrown
description: Force the owner crown next to usernames even if the server is large.

name: FriendInvites
description: Create and manage friend invite links via slash commands (/create friend invite, /view friend invites, /revoke friend invites).

name: GameActivityToggle
description: Adds a button next to the mic and deafen button to toggle game activity.

name: GifPaste
description: Makes picking a gif in the gif picker insert a link into the chatbox instead of instantly sending it

name: GreetStickerPicker
description: Allows you to use any greet sticker instead of only the random one by right-clicking the 'Wave to say hi!' button

name: HideAttachments
description: Hide attachments and Embeds for individual messages via hover button

name: iLoveSpam
description: Do not hide messages from 'likely spammers'

name: IgnoreActivities
description: Ignore certain activities (like games and actual activities) from showing up on your status. You can configure which ones are ignored from the Registered Games and Activities tabs.

name: ImageZoom
description: Lets you zoom in to images and gifs. Use scroll wheel to zoom in and shift + scroll wheel to increase lens radius / size

name: InvisibleChat
description: Encrypt your Messages in a non-suspicious way!

name: KeepCurrentChannel
description: Attempt to navigate to the channel you were in before switching accounts or loading Discord.

name: LastFMRichPresence
description: Little plugin for Last.fm rich presence

name: LoadingQuotes
description: Replace Discords loading quotes

name: MemberCount
description: Shows the amount of online & total members in the server member list

name: MessageClickActions
description: Hold Backspace and click to delete, double click to edit/reply

name: MessageLinkEmbeds
description: Adds a preview to messages that link another message

name: MessageLogger
description: Temporarily logs deleted and edited messages.

name: MessageTags
description: Allows you to save messages and to use them with a simple command.

name: MoreCommands
description: echo, lenny, mock

name: MoreKaomoji
description: Adds more Kaomoji to discord. ãƒ½(Â´â–½`)/

name: MoreUserTags
description: Adds tags for webhooks and moderative roles (owner, admin, etc.)

name: MuteNewGuild
description: Mutes newly joined guilds

name: MutualGroupDMs
description: Shows mutual group dms in profiles

name: NoBlockedMessages
description: Hides all blocked messages from chat completely.

name: NoDevtoolsWarning
description: Disables the 'HOLD UP' banner in the console. As a side effect, also prevents Discord from hiding your token, which prevents random logouts.

name: NoF1
description: Disables F1 help bind.

name: NoPendingCount
description: Removes the ping count of incoming friend requests, message requests, and nitro offers.

name: NoProfileThemes
description: Completely removes Nitro profile themes

name: NoRPC
description: Disables Discord's RPC server.

name: NoReplyMention
description: Disables reply pings by default

name: NoScreensharePreview
description: Disables screenshare previews from being sent.

name: NoSystemBadge
description: Disables the taskbar and system tray unread count badge.

name: NoUnblockToJump
description: Allows you to jump to messages of blocked users without unblocking them

name: NSFWGateBypass
description: Allows you to access NSFW channels without setting/verifying your age

name: oneko
description: cat follow mouse (real)

name: OpenInApp
description: Open Spotify, Steam and Epic Games URLs in their respective apps instead of your browser

name: Party mode ðŸŽ‰
description: Allows you to use party mode cause the party never ends âœ¨

name: PermissionsViewer
description: View the permissions a user or channel has, and the roles of a server

name: petpet
description: Adds a /petpet slash command to create headpet gifs from any image

name: PinDMs
description: Allows you to pin private channels to the top of your DM list. To pin/unpin or reorder pins, right click DMs

name: PlainFolderIcon
description: Doesn't show the small guild icons in folders

name: PlatformIndicators
description: Adds platform indicators (Desktop, Mobile, Web...) to users

name: PronounDB
description: Adds pronouns to user messages using pronoundb

name: QuickMention
description: Adds a quick mention button to the message actions bar

name: QuickReply
description: Reply to (ctrl + up/down) and edit (ctrl + shift + up/down) messages via keybinds

name: ReactErrorDecoder
description: Replaces "Minifed React Error" with the actual error.

name: ReadAllNotificationsButton
description: Read all server notifications with a single button click!

name: RelationshipNotifier
description: Notifies you when a friend, group chat, or server removes you.

name: RevealAllSpoilers
description: Reveal all spoilers in a message by Ctrl-clicking a spoiler, or in the chat with Ctrl+Shift-click

name: ReverseImageSearch
description: Adds ImageSearch to image context menus

name: ReviewDB
description: Review other users (Adds a new settings to profiles)

name: RoleColorEverywhere
description: Adds the top role color anywhere possible

name: SearchReply
description: Adds a reply button to search results

name: SendTimestamps
description: Send timestamps easily via chat box button & text shortcuts. Read the extended description!

name: ServerListIndicators
description: Add online friend count or server count in the server list

name: ShikiCodeblocks
description: Brings vscode-style codeblocks into Discord, powered by Shiki

name: ShowAllMessageButtons
description: Always show all message buttons no matter if you are holding the shift key or not.

name: ShowConnections
description: Show connected accounts in user popouts

name: ShowHiddenChannels
description: Show channels that you do not have access to view.

name: ShowMeYourName
description: Display usernames next to nicks, or no nicks at all

name: SilentMessageToggle
description: Adds a button to the chat bar to toggle sending a silent message.

name: SilentTyping
description: Hide that you are typing

name: SortFriendRequests
description: Sorts friend requests by date of receipt

name: SpotifyControls
description: Adds a Spotify player above the account panel

name: SpotifyCrack
description: Free listen along, no auto-pausing in voice chat, and allows activity to continue playing when idling

name: SpotifyShareCommands
description: Share your current Spotify track, album or artist via slash command (/track, /album, /artist)

name: StartupTimings
description: Adds Startup Timings to the Settings menu

name: SupportHelper
description: Helps us provide support to you

name: TextReplace
description: Replace text in your messages. You can find pre-made rules in the #textreplace-rules channel in Vencord's Server

name: TimeBarAllActivities
description: Adds the Spotify time bar to all activities if they have start and end timestamps

name: Translate
description: Translate messages with Google Translate

name: TypingIndicator
description: Adds an indicator if someone is typing on a channel.

name: TypingTweaks
description: Show avatars and role colours in the typing indicator

name: Unindent
description: Trims leading indentation from codeblocks

name: UnsuppressEmbeds
description: Allows you to unsuppress embeds in messages

name: UrbanDictionary
description: Search for a word on Urban Dictionary via /urban slash command

name: UserVoiceShow
description: Shows whether a User is currently in a voice channel somewhere in their profile

name: USRBG
description: Displays user banners from USRBG, allowing anyone to get a banner without Nitro

name: ValidUser
description: Fix mentions for unknown users showing up as '<@343383572805058560>' (hover over a mention to fix it)

name: VoiceChatDoubleClick
description: Join voice chats via double click instead of single click

name: VcNarrator
description: Announces when users join, leave, or move voice channels via narrator

name: VencordToolbox
description: Adds a button next to the inbox button in the channel header that houses Vencord quick actions

name: ViewIcons
description: Makes avatars and banners in user profiles clickable, and adds View Icon/Banner entries in the user and server context menu

name: ViewRaw
description: Copy and view the raw content/data of any message.

name: VoiceMessages
description: Allows you to send voice messages like on mobile. To do so, right click the upload button and click Send Voice Message

name: VolumeBooster
description: Allows you to set the user and stream volume above the default maximum.

name: WebContextMenus
description: Re-adds context menus missing in the web version of Discord: Links & Images (Copy/Open Link/Image), Text Area (Copy, Cut, Paste, SpellCheck)

name: WebKeybinds
description: Re-adds keybinds missing in the web version of Discord: ctrl+t, ctrl+shift+t, ctrl+tab, ctrl+shift+tab, ctrl+1-9, ctrl+,

name: WhoReacted
description: Renders the Avatars of reactors

name: Wikisearch
description: Searches Wikipedia for your requested query. (/wikisearch)

name: NoTrack
description: Disable Discord's tracking ('science'), metrics and Sentry crash reporting

name: Settings
description: Adds Settings UI and debug info
